name: [Stable] Save Me Derek
description:
Completed [For the most part... except 1 minigame.]

Basically an array of mini-games that you have to complete in a "CERTAIN" order.

The names that are provided are friends who know Derek (Birthday Boy).

This was made 100 years ago so be kind, not to mention "Red's" game is incompleted and is the 5th "game" that should be played, but there isn't one so you'll have to look past it.

CONTROLS: Mostly Space, sometimes Cursor, and for one game- A,S,D

Disclaimer?:

Music and sound effects dont belong to me... I'm sure the theme is from RPGMaker
